verses.verse: The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> again<WH3254> did<WH6213> that which was evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh;<WH3068> and Yahweh<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of the Philistines<WH6430> forty<WH705> years.<WH8141>

There was a certain<WH259> man<WH376> of Zorah,<WH6881> of the family<WH4940> of the Danites,<WH1839> whose name<WH8034> was Manoah;<WH4495> and his wife<WH802> was barren,<WH6135> and didn't<WH3205> bear.

The angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> to the woman,<WH802> and said<WH559> to her,<WH6135> "See now, you are barren, and don't<WH3205> bear; but you shall conceive,<WH2029> and bear<WH3205> a son.<WH1121>
Now therefore please beware<WH8104> and drink<WH8354> no wine<WH3196> nor strong drink,<WH8354> and don't<WH398> eat any unclean thing:<WH2931>

for,<WH2030> behold, you shall conceive, and bear<WH3205> a son;<WH1121> and no razor<WH4177> shall come<WH5927> on his head;<WH7218> for the child<WH5288> shall be a Nazirite<WH5139> to God<WH430> from the womb:<WH990> and he shall begin<WH2490> to save<WH3467> Israel<WH3478> out of the hand<WH3027> of the Philistines.<WH6430>"

Then the woman<WH802> came<WH935> and told<WH559> her husband,<WH376> saying,<WH559> "A man<WH376> of God<WH430> came<WH935> to me,<WH4758> and his face was like the face<WH4758> of the angel<WH4397> of God,<WH430> very<WH3966> awesome;<WH3372> and I didn't<WH7592> ask him where he was from,<WH5046> neither did he tell me his name:<WH8034>

but he said<WH559> to me,<WH2030> 'Behold, you shall conceive, and bear<WH3205> a son;<WH1121> and now drink<WH7941> no wine<WH3196> nor strong drink,<WH8354> and eat<WH398> not any unclean<WH2932> thing;<WH5288> for the child shall be a Nazirite<WH5139> to God<WH430> from the womb<WH990> to the day<WH3117> of his death.<WH4194>'"

Then Manoah<WH4495> entreated<WH6279> Yahweh,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> "Oh,<WH994> Lord,<WH3068> please let<WH4994> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> whom you did send<WH7971> come again<WH935> to us,<WH3384> and teach us what we shall do<WH6213> to the child<WH5288> who shall be born.<WH3205>"

God<WH430> listened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of Manoah;<WH4495> and the angel<WH4397> of God<WH430> came again<WH935> to the woman<WH802> as she sat<WH3427> in the field:<WH7704> but Manoah,<WH4495> her husband,<WH376> wasn't with her.

The woman<WH802> made haste,<WH4116> and ran,<WH7323> and told<WH559> her husband,<WH376> and said<WH559> to him,<WH376> "Behold, the man has appeared<WH7200> to me,<WH935> who came to me that day.<WH3117>"

Manoah<WH4495> arose,<WH6965> and went<WH3212> after<WH310> his wife,<WH802> and came<WH935> to the man,<WH376> and said<WH559> to him,<WH376> "Are you the man who spoke<WH1696> to the woman?<WH802>" He said,<WH559> "I am."
Manoah<WH4495> said,<WH559> "Now let your words<WH1697> happen.<WH935> What shall the child<WH5288>'s way<WH4941> of life and mission be?<WH4639>"
The angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Manoah,<WH4495> "Of all that I said<WH559> to the woman<WH802> let her beware.<WH8104>

She may not eat<WH398> of anything that comes<WH3318> of the vine,<WH1612> neither let her drink<WH8354> wine<WH3196> or strong drink,<WH8354> nor eat<WH398> any unclean<WH2932> thing;<WH6680> all that I commanded her let her observe.<WH8104>"
Manoah<WH4495> said<WH559> to the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh,<WH3068> "Please,<WH6113> let us detain you,<WH1423> that we may make a young goat ready<WH6213> for you.<WH6440>"

The angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Manoah,<WH4495> "Though you detain<WH6113> me,<WH398> I won't eat of your bread;<WH3899> and if<WH518> you will prepare<WH6213> a burnt offering,<WH6213> you must offer<WH6213> it to Yahweh.<WH3068>" For Manoah<WH4495> didn't<WH3045> know that he was the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
Manoah<WH4495> said<WH559> to the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh,<WH3068> "What is your name,<WH8034> that when your words<WH1697> happen,<WH935> we may honor you?<WH3513>"
The angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to him,<WH7592> "Why do you ask about my name,<WH8034> since it is wonderful?<WH6383>"

So Manoah<WH4495> took<WH3947> the young goat<WH1423> with the meal offering,<WH4503> and offered<WH5927> it on the rock<WH6697> to Yahweh.<WH3068> Then the angel did<WH6213> a wonderful<WH6381> thing as Manoah<WH4495> and his wife<WH802> looked on.<WH7200>

For it happened,<WH3851> when the flame went up<WH5927> toward the sky<WH8064> from off the altar,<WH4196> that the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> ascended<WH5927> in the flame<WH3851> of the altar:<WH4196> and Manoah<WH4495> and his wife<WH802> looked on;<WH7200> and they fell on<WH7200> their faces<WH6440> to the ground.<WH776>

But the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> didn't<WH7200> appear to Manoah<WH4495> or to his wife<WH802> any more.<WH3254> Then Manoah<WH4495> knew<WH3045> that he was the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
Manoah<WH4495> said<WH559> to his wife,<WH802> "We shall surely<WH4191> die,<WH4191> because we have seen<WH7200> God.<WH430>"

But his wife<WH802> said<WH559> to him,<WH3863> "If Yahweh<WH3068> were pleased<WH2654> to kill<WH4191> us,<WH3947> he wouldn't have received a burnt offering<WH5930> and a meal offering<WH5930> at our hand,<WH3027> neither would he have shown<WH7200> us all these things,<WH6256> nor would at this time have told<WH8085> such things as these.<WH2063>"
The woman<WH802> bore<WH3205> a son,<WH1121> and named<WH7121> him<WH8034> Samson:<WH8123> and the child<WH5288> grew,<WH1431> and Yahweh<WH3068> blessed him.<WH1288>
The Spirit<WH7307> of Yahweh<WH3068> began<WH2490> to move<WH6470> him in Mahaneh<WH4264> Dan,<WH1835> between Zorah<WH6881> and Eshtaol.<WH847>
